title: FT/FS: Raw commons - 4 left including 2 PBs (Price drop 10/29)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Raw commons - 4 left including 2 PBs (Price drop 10/29)
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone....

I've got a bunch of raw dupes available for sale or trade. 

If buying, please include $2 shipping regardless of how many you buy.  Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

For trades, I'm looking for EPDG's and over sized cards. 

And as usual, I will of course listen to offers, especially if buying more than 1.

All sold

posts.post_title: Bump for price drop on remaining
posts.post_content: Bump for price drop on remaining

I would like to compliment you on whatever scanner you are using. The resolution of the pics are just right!

Take Care Charlie

Thanks Charlie.

Unfortunately the graded scans don't work as well.

Best thing for ungraded is to post it to Photobucket or some other image hosting service and imbed a direct a link of the picture instead of uploading the picture and it getting shrunk.

Makes a big difference.
